about_the_game: Epic conclusion to The House of the Da Vinci series. This third instalment of this popular Video Game is filled with a range of emotional and tense moments. And the soundtrack reflects it in every way possible. From the work with thematic materials, to developing instrumentation - the music covers all important parts of the game. Tomas Zivor (composer for the whole series) approached composing this third part in a grander way. By using choir and periodic instruments, accompanied by strings, the whole album feels very cinematic and true to the source - the game and its story. Featuring Czech singer Kamila Nyvltova in the Main Theme. Immerse yourself in the wonderful world of The House of Da Vinci.
